title.narrative: CROSS-CUTTING ISSUES

description.narrative: Strategies to address cross-cutting issues (resilience, gender) related to child rights are developed and applied in addition to improved field operation and supply chain management., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Adolescent Empowerment (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses (Covid), Disaster Risk Reduction, Disaster Risk Reduction (Covid), Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices (Covid), Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strategies to address cross-cutting issues (resilience, gender) related to child rights are developed and applied in addition to improved field operation and supply chain management.

description.narrative: Leadership of the national humanitarian action service, with a strong institutional base, is being consolidated for the coordination and management of the humanitarian response in Guinea. Support to gender-responsive education sector planning was provided during the analysis and development of ProDEG 2020–2029. The joint Programme and Operations End-User Monitoring was launched during the last quarter of the year. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
